ygData.subject: clinging darkness question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve just reached the 15th level and am having a blast with my new spells.  My question for more experienced shadowkinghts is, is clinging darkness cumulative?
ygData.messageBody:
I've just reached the 15th level and am having a blast with my new
spells. My question for more experienced shadowkinghts is, is clinging
darkness cumulative? In other words if I cast it on an npc twice am I
getting twice the effect, or is there no difference. Also, how long
does the effect persist for?

I've also been using fear, but it seems to fizzle quite a bit. It's
been very handy when I'm low on health from fighting something and then
get jumped by a fire elemental or something. I usually try to switch
targets and fear the new attacker so I can finish off the first and
run. It gets a bit dangerous when I'm under a bubble and fear keeps
fizzling though.

Thanks,

Atrocity
Bertoxulous
